IRendererMarshaller

Creates a renderer that runs on its own thread and method calls are marshalled from the client to render thread.  The renderer is on a separate thread where the client is calling from.

Header

Rendering/Caustic/IRendererMarshaller.h

Functions

Parameters

std::wstring&

path to directory containing shaders

renderCallback
std::function<void(IRenderer* pRenderer, IRenderCtx* pRenderCtx, int pass)>

callback function that is called each time a new frame is rendered

prePresentCallback
std::function<void(IRenderer* pRenderer)>

callback function that is called right before Present()

startFrozen
bool

Should renderer be started in a frozen state?

desktopIndex
int

index indicating which desktop to use with duplication service

CreateRendererMarshaller
CRefObj<IRendererMarshaller> CreateRendererMarshaller()

Global function for creating the RendererMarshaller. This method should generally not be called. Use the ICausticFactory to create new Caustic objects.

Returns

Returns the newly created RendererMarshaller.
